data.name: Sigh of the Abyss
data.detailed_description:
Play Shadow Bonds, the free prologue

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1829640/Sigh_of_the_Abyss_Shadow_Bonds__Prologue/


About the Game

You are the product of a bloody ritual; human in appearance, yet imbued with monstrous powers. The men and women that sacrificed their life for yours speak to you in whispers, beg you to put their spirits to rest. Will you acquiesce to them or will you defy them?


Divide the gifts of the Abyss as you see fit—will you have supernatural strength, a knack for magic or a personality so strong it bends the will of others?



Your reactions are influenced by the four humors. Sanguine, phlegmatic, choleric or melancholic—what kind of emotional response will color your interactions?


Will you stay friends, turn into bitter rivals, or seek something more with your companions?


The nobles feast while corruption festers and the poor struggle to go to sleep without shaking from hunger.
The city spills out of its walls, ever-expanding and craving more. Lavish trading posts are established while beggars and vagrants watch. The city guard hoards weapons and cultivates resentment.

Take control of the city or let it explode in blood and revolts—it's up to you.


Traditional choices, personality answers and skill checks add depth and make every playthrough unique.
Every arc of the overarching plot has expansive branches and dialogue trees, and the consequences of your actions will be felt by the city and its inhabitants.


  • Customize the protagonist's name, skills and romantic preferences
  • A branching narrative with hard choices and terrible consequences
  • Several detailed endings
  • Two female love interests, Sylas and Marané, and two male ones, Alpheon and Malec
  • Learn more about the rich setting through codex entries

data.short_description: Embrace the monster within to change the fate of a nation in this dark fantasy visual novel.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

movies.name: Sigh of the Abyss narrative teaser

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work because of the following: murder, suicide, text-only descriptions of gore, blood on screen, stalking, implied nudity, sexual innuendos, coarse language, legal alcohol consumption.
